sentences.sContent: We have to factor that into the calculus.
sentences.sContent_eng: We have to factor that into the calculus.
sentences.sCn: 我们要在微积分学中考虑这些因素。

sentences.sContent: All this leads up to the most fundamental of theorems of calculus .
sentences.sContent_eng: All this leads up to the most fundamental of theorems of calculus .
sentences.sCn: 综上所述就导出了微积分学中的最基本的定理。

sentences.sContent: Obstruction with stasis also led to the formation of the yellow-brown calculus (stone).
sentences.sContent_eng: Obstruction with stasis also led to the formation of the yellow-brown calculus (stone).
sentences.sCn: 伴有尿液郁积的阻塞还能导致黄褐色的结石（石头）形成。

phrases.pCn: 矢量微积分；矢算；向量计算；矢量计算

remMethod.val: calcul(计算) + us → 微积分学

words.tran: 结石的，结石症的；石一般的

trans.tranOther: the part of mathematics that deals with changing quantities, such as the speed of a falling stone or the slope of a curved line
